Profile Summary
Rahul Sahni
+91 9953812497 | rahul.sahni2010@gmail.com
LinkedIn:linkedin.com/in/RahulSahni
Seasoned and versatile Sales and client servicing professional with 9+ years of cross functional experience
across highly reputed organizations. With proven knowledge of Team Management, Solutions selling,
Strategic Negotiations, Relationship Management, Operational excellence, Market research and
Consultative sales. Effective communicator who quickly masters new roles and technologies to achieve
positive results. Exposure in establishing and developing relationships with key stakeholders and decision-
makers for revenue growth; skilled in handling marketing and business development functions
Professional Experience
TeamLease Degree Apprenticeship
Senior Account Manager-Regional Head
Apr 2022 to Present

Ensure customer retention and growth of the existing portfolio of enterprise accounts. Revenue growth by
driving sales from corporates , margin expansion and drive profitability

Maintain a deep knowledge and understanding of related policies NEEM, Apprenticeship Act. (NAPS),
globalpractices, academic research and industrial trends

Build and maintain strategic relationships with key stakeholders across the portfolio. Visit client
locations regularly to understand their requirements and drive profitability

Train and develop high performing team, extracting highest level of efficiency and productivity

Build and execute strategic account plan that delivers on key business initiatives by identifying up-selling and
cross-selling opportunities. Showcased revenue growth of 21% QoQ in portfolio in the last two quarters

Manage key improvement initiatives and projects: Drive new product launches and relationship extensions
by partnering with the business development, onboarding and learning team

Promote and ensure a customer-focused culture of high performance and excellence in teaching, learning,
and assessment. Utilize the knowledge of sector specialists within the organization. Provide regular reports
on performance and progress including use of CRM system

Designed and organized webinars, networking events, conferences, and exhibitions to create awareness
regarding Apprenticeship Act., hence maximizing opportunities
Quess Corp limited- Quess IT Staffing, Mumbai
Sales Manager
Feb 2020 to July 2021

Led the inside sales team for the organization which included managing KPI’s of the team members and
training/implementing structured sales pitch for better synchronization and lead generation for the sales
team

Led the sales efforts of the organization for the managed services solutions and worked with multiple
vendors and customers across geographical locations in Southeast Asia (Indonesia, Philippines) and Australia

Led the sales efforts for digital and gaming vertical clients across the country. Key highlights of the vertical
were signing of two gaming giants in the world with annual contract value of approx. 4.8 Cr INR

Key responsibilities included developing relationships with key decision-makers in large corporate and
enterprises for business development, Cross/Up selling opportunities & cultivating healthy relations with the
clients/Prospects

Worked on drafting and reviewing contracts with internal stakeholders (legal team, group CEO etc.) and
client stakeholders to ensure timely signup and on boarding of the resource(s)

Researched and implemented the automation of the entire legal documentation process for the
organization which led to reducing the sales cycle of 7-8 business days, timely onboarding of the resources,
on-time invoicing and reduced overall cost by minimizing errors/document loss removing compliance risks
and liabilities
Talocity, Gurugram & Mumbai
Senior Sales Manager (Business Head- West India)
April 2018 to Feb 2020

Developed relationships with key decision-makers in large corporate and enterprises for business
development, Cross/Up selling opportunities by suggesting most viable services & cultivated healthy
relationships with the clients/prospects
Academic Qualifications
Awards & Achievements

Presented the company's value proposition to global HR heads, CXO's, potential clients and consultant
partners through multiple venues like exhibitions, conferences, domain talks, etc while managing and
maintaining a pipeline of approximately 5 Cr interested prospects/leads

Mapped the potential clients with relevant stakeholders to ensure maximum impact and to help strategize
future communications and ensure smooth & shorter sales cycle.

Marketing event planning, execution and negotiation. Drafting and reviewing contracts. Reporting on
successes and areas of improvement for the technology team basis client feedback and requirements

Handled a team of Sales and Operations to ensure a consistent flow of clients and ensuring effective
management of these accounts through the Operations team

Worked closely with the technology team to enhance and incorporate additional features basis client
feedback or requirements

Handled the operations team for the region and established/improved processes to improve customer
experience and user adoption.
Solaris Power, Gurugram
Senior Support Engineer
July 2015 to Mar 2017

Worked as a key account lead for various global power clients and government PSU’s

Critical team member for several sales kick-off meetings

Responsible for managing 3 large accounts to the tune of approximately INR 1 Cr each

Received “Client Value Creation” award in 2016 for consistently delivering quality results and receiving
consistent high rating in customer satisfaction

Reduced human effort by 80% by initiating and creating an automated dashboard for monitoring Production
services which helped in identifying and resolving potential problems proactively which saved around Rs 8
lakhs annually
Accenture, Mumbai
Software Engineer
July 2011 to Jan 2015

Worked in a cross functional team for a major US based Utility Company for project management, product
development, quality improvement and project migrations

Led a major project from offshore that involved migration of production environment from VB6 to C# with zero
post-production defects and improved operations of client by 50%

Analysed daily payments data to be sent to various global suppliers using Oracle database and self-developed
visualization tools and suggested changes to clients to improve efficiency and identify high value customers

Extensive exposure in handling high pressure situations through critical problem management in the pre-go-
live and hyper care phase

Received Accenture IDC Outperform Award in Q2 2012 for consistent high-quality work and excellence as a
business operator

Avid sports enthusiast, poker nerd, love to travel to new places and watch documentaries
